Articles.Content: hello guys ,, can you help me ... i have this mod name ASETProps from alexustas . i fell in love with this mod . this mods give you the props to make IVA so you can make your own iva ... but i dont know how to make iva ... can you guys help mee ... by making videos .. because i could not follow all the step in word ... soo plzz guys . just plzz help mee i have both Unity and Blender so teach me how... this is the link to the modh[removed link to defunct website]
